nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Commander Asajj Ventress was in command of a fleet of warships as part of the naval forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The fleet participated in the Battle of Sullust, where it engaged Galactic Republic naval forces led by Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, as well as Admiral Wullf Yularen.

The fleet included at least two starfighter squadrons, Trident group one and Trident group two. The fleet consisted of a Providence-class Dreadnought that served as the flagship, a Recusant-class light destroyer that was helmed by Commander TJ-912, another Recusant-class light destroyer, and six Munificent-class star frigates. The flagship was destroyed by TJ-912's vessel after the fleet received orders to kill Asajj Ventress.
